Paragraph.Text: Matter Movers are a high-speed, high-energy method of moving resources around your mining operation. They are simple in usage; supply with power as you would any other machine, and place them adjacent to the source Storage Hopper and facing towards the destination Storage Hopper. The cost to mattermit does not depend on distance. Line of sight to the destination hopper is required. This block does not block movement.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Max. Transport Rate: Power Required: Max. Power Recharge Rate: Power Capacity: Max. Range:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 4800 items per minute 64 per item 12288 /s (per face) 24576 8m
